newsitem.title: USA: Alamco says in talks about possible merger.
newsitem.headline: Alamco says in talks about possible merger.

text.p: Alamco Inc, an independent gas and oil producer, said Thursday it is in discussions involving a possible business combination.
The company provided no details but said that no agreement or letter intend has been signed. There is no assurance, it said, that a transaction will be consummated.
In January, Alamco hired Principal Financial Securities Inc to find ways to raise shareholder value, including the posisbility of a sale or merger of part or all of the company.
Alamco, which has operations in West Virginia, Tennessee and Kentucky, posted a net income of $2.7 million or $0.54 a share for 1996, on revenues of $23.1 million.
